name: Extended-cms
body: - [eXtended CMS](#sec-1) - [Installation](#sec-2) - [Test](#sec-3) - [Usage](#sec-4) # eXtended CMS calculated extended contact mode score provided the query and template protein-ligand structures # Installation The easiest way is to use `pip`. ```sh pip install xcms ``` To install locally ```sh pip install xcms --user ``` # Test In command line, go to the uncharived xcms directory, in most cases it would be `extended-cms`. Then follow the commands below: ```sh cd ./tests/ py.test ./tests/test_cli.py ``` # Usage To use it: ```sh x-cms --help ```
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
